CustomField.description: Formula field - If the related Intake's Status = Referred Out AND the task owner equals the Final Intake User AND Final Intake User is not blank/null THEN 1, ELSE 0
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Credit_Type__c, 'Final Intake User') && ISPICKVAL(Intake__r.litify_pm__Status__c, 'Referred Out') && OwnerId = Intake__r.Final_Intake_User__c && NOT(ISBLANK(Intake__r.Final_Intake_User__c )), 1, 0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field - If the related Intake's Status = Referred Out AND the task owner equals the Final Intake User AND Final Intake User is not blank/null THEN 1, ELSE 0
CustomField.label: Referred Out Credit
